goals.description: Consistent ratings across all subordinates based on predetermined manager criteria
Decrease amount of time taken by managers to generate performance reviews.

metrics.description: Total effort required to complete reviews

system.usage_context: The LLM will be prompted as part of an application, ReviewPro, that is a chatbot used to aid managers in writing performance reviews. The LLM components are intended to provide a more consistent rating across subordinates based on pre-determined criteria and saves time for managers by generating written feedback.
risks: Inconsistent reviews across all reviewed individuals

data.description: EvalPro will receive as inputs manager comments, the employee's self evaluation, and goals and objectives

input_specification.name: prompt
input_specification.description: A prompt will be developed which will contain the employee's goals and objectives, the employee's statement, and the managers notes.  Additionally, the prompt will contain the criteria and scale for evaluation, and information for any flags or notifications that are needed"

input_specification.name: Manager notes
input_specification.description: Notes the manager has made on employee performance

input_specification.name: employee self evaluation
input_specification.description: The employee's own reflection and evaluation on their performance

input_specification.name: employee's goals and objectives
input_specification.description: The goals and objectives the employee and manager had made regarding employee's goals for the performance period

output_specification.name: Evaluation
output_specification.description: EvalPro will output a text evaluation based on the input data, categories and scale provided. This evaluation should summerize the employee's strengths and weaknesses, and pssibly provide relevant feedback

output_specification.name: Explination
output_specification.description: The LLM may be asked to generate an explanation on the evaluation provided.

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt asking for an explanation of a previously provided employee evaluation
system_requirements.response: The application will provide a rationale for the employee review

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt asking for an employee review
system_requirements.response: The model outputs an employee evaluation, including an overall performance score for the employee and an evaluation for each important sub-category.
system_requirements.measure: The LLM generated performance score should match the manager expected overall score in at least 95% of cases

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt asking for an employee review
system_requirements.response: The model outputs an employee evaluation, including an overall performance score for the employee and an evaluation for each important sub-category.
system_requirements.measure: The sub-category scores should average to match the overall score in at least 95% of the cases

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro may receive multiple entries of similarly performing employees for evaluation
system_requirements.response: n the case of similar prompts and input information, the LLM generated employee evaluation, including performance scores and evaluation summary,
system_requirements.measure: should be semantically similar each time

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro may receive prompts with different variations, such as casing, spacing, and punctuation
system_requirements.measure: should not be influenced by these input variations

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt for an employee evaluation
system_requirements.response: The time required for the application to retrun an employee evalaution, including a performance score,

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt for an employee evaluation
system_requirements.response: The returned performance evaluation, regardless of name and pronouns,
system_requirements.measure: should be the same for similar employee performance

system_requirements.stimulus: ReviewPro receives a prompt for an employee evaluation
system_requirements.response: The returned performance evaluation, regardless of the writing level of the employee self evaluation,
system_requirements.measure: should be the same for similar employee performance
